question: Pradhan Mantri Annadata Aay Sanrakshan Abhiyan (PM-AASHA) scheme comprises of?
explanation: In order to support the farmers under new farm law, Pradhan Mantri Annadata Aay SanraksHan Abhiyanâ€™ (PM-AASHA) is a scheme to ensure Minimum Support Price (MSP) to farmers which comprises of Price Support Scheme (PSS), Price Deficiency Payment Scheme (PDPS) and Private Procurement and Stockist Scheme (PPSS).
